    • getLeaderCard

      public LeaderCard getLeaderCard​(int slotNum)
      gets the leader card specified
      Parameters:
      slotNum - is 1 or 2 (every player has only two leader cards)
      Returns:
      the leader card requested if present, null il not initialized or if card was discarded

    • getLeaderCardByCardCode

      public LeaderCard getLeaderCardByCardCode​(int code)
      Parameters:
      code - is the unique code of the leader cards
      Returns:
      null if the specified code isn't present

    • setLeaderCard

      public void setLeaderCard​(LeaderCard newCard, int slotNum)
      sets the leader card passed
      Parameters:
      newCard - is the card to set
      slotNum - is 1 or 2 (every player has only two leader cards)

    • checkIfLeaderResourceRequirementIsMet

      public boolean checkIfLeaderResourceRequirementIsMet​(ResourceBox requirement)
      This method is used in parallel with isLeaderDevCardRequirementsMet and is used to check if a player can activate the effect of a leaderCard
      Parameters:
      requirement - is the resourceBox that is needed to the LeaderCard to be activated
      Returns:
      false if the requirement is not satisfied

    • checkIfProductionRequestedIsViable

      public boolean checkIfProductionRequestedIsViable​(boolean slot1Act, boolean slot2Act, boolean slot3Act, boolean baseProdAct, java.lang.String baseInputRes1, java.lang.String baseInputRes2, boolean leader1Act, int leader1Code, boolean leader2Act, int leader2Code)
      this is the method called when a player requests to do the production action on his turn all the params are pretty much the ones that arrive with the json message of the production request
      Parameters:
      slot1Act -
      slot2Act -
      slot3Act -
      baseProdAct -
      baseInputRes1 -
      baseInputRes2 -
      leader1Act -
      leader1Code -
      leader2Act -
      leader2Code -
      Returns:
      true if the production is viable, false if the player hasn't enough resources
